attributes.action: Remove Negative and Discriminatory portals of Young People in the Media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Highest Crime umongest the "YOUTH" was in the 1950 and 60's when todays Journalists were young people. We are not Yobs or brain washed thugs we are Human beings so its time the Media started treating us like Humans and not animals thats what this petition is designed for.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
